channel.title: Huge 2k Pack on Steam

Would you say it's worth it?
I dunno if I want to buy it or not and want to hear some opinions :P

item.title: Huge 2k Pack on Steam
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:10, topic:286700”][quote author=PeterMan link=topic=379156.msg2856834#msg2856834 date=1246921966]
Also I just wanted to get this out in the open…

I would jizz my pants if someone modded Sid Meier’s Pirates! and made it online.

Like San Andreas Multiplayer or Oblivion Online, it’s proven that stuff like this isn’t impossible.
[/quote]
have you ever played oblivion online? it was the worst thing ever created[/quote]
It was still a creation

item.title: Huge 2k Pack on Steam
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Every game you add to your account adds worth to it. Like if you wanted to sell it later on. Like on mine I have all the popular fps, and I have an older account, so it’s worth like twice what I paid for the games, cause I bought 'em all when they were on sale.
